loading_tips: üìà Every tracked expense is a step toward financial control
üß† Knowledge is power, especially in finance

proyecciones.title: üîÆ Financial Projections
proyecciones.no_data: Not enough historical data to generate projections.
proyecciones.no_data_hint: Add at least 3 months of movements to activate predictions.
proyecciones.confidence_explanation: Confidence is based on R¬≤ (coefficient of determination) from linear regression. A high value indicates historical data follows a predictable pattern.
proyecciones.current_year_avg_explanation: Current year average salary is calculated as the monthly average projected by the model based on historical trends.
proyecciones.investment_calc_explanation: Investments are projected by applying the average savings rate ({rate}%) to projected income, adjusted for historical savings trends.
proyecciones.no_insights: Accumulate more data to generate automatic insights.
proyecciones.current_year_note: ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Year {year}**: The monthly average shows the ACTUAL average of {historical_months} elapsed month(s). The annual total combines actual data + projection for the remaining {projected_months} months.

income_trend_positive.title: Positive Income Trend
income_trend_positive.message: Your income is growing ~{increase}‚Ç¨/year. Projection based on {months} months of data. Model confidence: {confidence}%.

income_trend_negative.title: Alert: Income Decreasing
income_trend_negative.message: A drop of ~{decrease}‚Ç¨/year in your income is detected. Check for changes in your employment status or income sources.

income_trend_stable.title: Stable Income
income_trend_stable.message: Your income remains stable around {avg}‚Ç¨/month. No significant changes projected.

savings_rate_exceptional.title: Exceptional Savings Rate
savings_rate_exceptional.message: You invest {rate}% of your income. This puts you in the top tier of savers. At this pace, you will accumulate a substantial fund in 5 years.

savings_rate_excellent.title: Excellent Savings Rate
savings_rate_excellent.message: With a {rate}% investment rate, you are building wealth solidly. Keep it up.

savings_rate_good.title: Good Savings Rate
savings_rate_good.message: You invest {rate}%. To reach the 20% target, you would need to increase by ~{deficit}pp more.

savings_rate_improvable.title: Improvable Savings Rate
savings_rate_improvable.message: You only invest {rate}% of your income. Review superfluous expenses to increase investment.

savings_rate_none.title: No Investment Detected
savings_rate_none.message: No investments detected in your history. Consider allocating at least 10% of your income to savings/investment.

expense_growing.message: This category is growing by {pct}% monthly (avg: {avg}‚Ç¨/month). If the trend continues, it will double in ~{doubling_time} months.

expense_decreasing.title: Reduction in: {category}
expense_decreasing.message: You have reduced expenses in this category by {pct}% monthly. Good control!

expense_ratio_high.title: Very High Expenses
expense_ratio_high.message: Your expenses represent {ratio}% of your income. Very tight margin for unforeseen events.

expense_ratio_excellent.title: Excellent Expense Control
expense_ratio_excellent.message: You only spend {ratio}% of your income. Great savings capacity.

accumulating_data.title: Accumulating Data
accumulating_data.message: You have {entries} registered entries. With more historical data (3+ months), predictions will be more accurate.

chat_search.title: üí¨ Chat Search - Financial Assistant
chat_search.subtitle: Ask about your finances and get answers based on your real data
chat_search.input_placeholder: Type your question... E.g: How much did I spend on restaurants in 2025?
examples: How much did I spend on Mery's Christmas gift in 2025?
How much did I spend on alcohol in 2023?
What was my highest spending category last month?
Show me my biggest expenses this week
How much have I invested this year?
What is my average savings rate?
chat_search.llm_not_configured: ‚ö†Ô∏è LLM service is not configured. Go to Utilities > AI Configuration to enable it.
chat_search.no_messages: No messages yet. Ask your first question!

consequences.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Consequences Rules
consequences.info: Define rules to apply 'punishment' retentions based on your expenses. These retentions will be automatically invested the following month.

quick_add.title: ‚ûï Quick Add
quick_add.liquidity_help: Mark if you need to advance this income to current month

validation.no_categories_setup: No categories found. Run setup_db.py first.
validation.month_closed: üîí Cannot add entries to closed month **{month}**.

initial_balance_config.info: This is the first month with no previous history. Enter your current account balance.

step1.title_despues: Step 1: Actual Bank Balance (with salary received)
step1.description_antes: How much money is in your account **RIGHT NOW** (before receiving the next salary)?
step1.description_despues: How much money is in your account **RIGHT NOW** (with the new salary already received)?
step1.expected_balance_info: üí° Expected initial balance from previous closing available

step2.title: Step 2: New Salary
step2.description: Amount of your **next salary** (for the following month):

step3.title: Step 3: Retentions
step3.surplus_help: Percentage of surplus balance to transfer to investment
step3.salary_help: Percentage of new salary to transfer to investment

step5.salary_registered: üí∞ When closing **{closed_month}**, the salary for **{next_month}** was registered: **{amount}**

historico.title: üìÖ Historic Analysis
historico.chart_click_hint: üí° Click on a bar to see that month's details

analysis.select_type: Select what you want to analyze:

defaults.title: üìã Default Values by Category
defaults.info: Configure default values to speed up data entry. These values will be automatically applied when selecting each category in the Quick Add form.

export.description: Download all ledger entries in CSV format.

import.title: üì• Import Legacy Data
import.description: Upload a CSV file to import entries into the system.

cleanup.title: üóëÔ∏è Clean Database
cleanup.option1_warning: This will delete **{count}** LEDGER entries and **all month closures** recorded.
cleanup.option1_success: ‚úÖ Database cleaned. {count} entries and all closures deleted.
cleanup.option2_error: This will delete ALL data including categories. DB will be regenerated with default categories.
cleanup.option2_success: ‚úÖ Full reset. Database re-initialized with default categories.

categories.title: üè∑Ô∏è Category Management
categories.info: Modify category names or types. Changes will reflect automatically in all historical entries.

config.title: ‚öôÔ∏è System Configuration
config.enable_relevance_help: If disabled, fields and charts related to expense relevance classification will be hidden.
config.enable_retentions_help: If disabled, the system will not calculate or suggest investment retentions (salary/remaining) during month closing.
config.enable_consequences_help: Activates the rule system to penalize specific expenses with additional investment next month.
config.enable_llm_help: Activates automatic financial analysis with Artificial Intelligence using Ollama. Requires Ollama installed and a model downloaded.
config.llm_model_help: Choose the Ollama model to use. Larger models offer better quality but require more RAM and are slower.
config.llm_no_models: üìö Download a model with: `ollama pull phi3` or `ollama pull tinyllama`
config.llm_not_running: üöÄ Install Ollama from https://ollama.com/download and make sure it's running.
config.ollama_no_models_warn: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ollama is running but no models are installed.
config.ollama_not_running_err: ‚ùå Ollama is not running or not installed
config.section1_info: These values will be used as defaults in the month closing wizard.
config.closing_method_label: When do you check your bank balance?
config.closing_method_help: Choose whether you check your balance before or after receiving salary when closing the month
config.slider_rem_help: Default value to retain from surplus balance
config.slider_sal_help: Default value to retain from salary
config.section2_info: These texts will be suggested when adding entries for each category.

llm.not_enabled: LLM service is not enabled. Please enable it in Utilities > AI Configuration.
llm.assistant_intro: ü§ñ I'm the **PersAcc** financial assistant. I don't have information about that, but I can help you with your personal finances.
llm.example_restaurants: How much did I spend on restaurants this month?
llm.example_expenses: What are my biggest expenses in 2024?

llm.past_year_error: Year {year} seems incorrect. Did you mean {current_year}?
llm.invalid_month: Invalid month: {month}. Must be between 1 and 12.
llm.limit_invalid: Invalid limit: {limit}. Must be a positive number.
llm.processing_error: Sorry, there was an error processing your query: {error}
